name: Shadow of Blood (Event Horizon School)
description:
The player plays the role of a human who turned into a vampire, not knowing who embraced him.

So he will try to uncover the mystery about his status as a vampire while also fending off various enemies that will try to kill him

FEATURES LIST:

  • Different kinds of enemies
  • Diversified movesets
  • Score system
  • 6 selectable levels
  • Horde system
  • Health pickups

DEVELOPED BY:

INFINITE MONKEYS

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2021/2022)

Programming:

  • Luca Sandrone
  • Simone Bernobich
  • Lorenzo Ponzo

Game Design:

  • Amedeo Favi
  • Francesco Cocino

3D Art:

  • Daniele Summa

Concept Art:

  • Mirko Briguglio
